TEMPORAL_RIFT.NAME: Temporal Rift
TEMPORAL_RIFT.DESCRIPTION: A distortion in the air flickers like a wound in reality. The landscape bends and folds upon itself.

F1.TITLE: Frozen Moment
F1.DESCRIPTION: Birds hang motionless midair. Even your heartbeat seems delayed. The world moves a half-second too slow.

OBSERVE.DESCRIPTION: You watch a raindrop suspended before your eyes.
OBSERVE.SUCCESS: Time resumes for a heartbeat, you see glimpses of yourself standing elsewhere.
OBSERVE.FAIL: The distortion flares, your mind reels from the paradox.

INTERACT.DESCRIPTION: You reach toward the ripple, the air resists your hand like thick glass.

F2.TITLE: Echo of the Past
F2.DESCRIPTION: A familiar figure stands before you — yourself, or rather, a version that shouldn't exist.

INFERNAL_SURGE.NAME: Infernal Surge
INFERNAL_SURGE.DESCRIPTION: The air burns red; cracks in the ground emit faint screams. Something beneath the crust struggles to escape.

F1.TITLE: Blistered Ground
F1.DESCRIPTION: The earth pulses with molten veins. You can almost hear a heartbeat under the soil.

OBSERVE.DESCRIPTION: You study the fissures closely, the glow responds to your movement.

PRAY.SUCCESS: The air cools momentarily, the anomaly weakens.
PRAY.FAIL: A burst of heat sears your arm. Something stirs below.

F2.TITLE: Infernal Gate
F2.DESCRIPTION: A tear opens, revealing shifting shadows and a smile of fire.

MECHANICAL_DISTORTION.NAME: Mechanical Distortion
MECHANICAL_DISTORTION.DESCRIPTION: Ruins of ancient machines twist around a humming sphere. Sparks jump through the air with rhythmic precision.

F1.TITLE: Echoing Halls
F1.DESCRIPTION: Broken gears and bronze pillars hum with a life of their own. The air smells of ozone and oil.

OBSERVE.DESCRIPTION: You notice patterns in the hum — it's almost musical.

INTERACT.DESCRIPTION: You approach the core fragment cautiously.
INTERACT.SUCCESS: You stabilize a fragment of power, energy flows in reverse, harmlessly dissipating.
INTERACT.FAIL: Sparks leap to your fingers, leaving a painful burn.

F2.TITLE: Core Awakening
F2.DESCRIPTION: The machine's heart flickers; the orb reactivates, scanning for threats.

CORRUPTED_GROVE.NAME: Corrupted Grove
CORRUPTED_GROVE.DESCRIPTION: Once serene, the forest trembles under a dark influence. Trees twist unnaturally, sap runs black.

F1.TITLE: Black Roots
F1.DESCRIPTION: You step over roots that pulse faintly like veins. The air smells of rot and incense.

OBSERVE.DESCRIPTION: You see runes carved into tree bark, oozing sap like blood.

INTERACT.DESCRIPTION: You touch the nearest root — it twitches violently!

F2.TITLE: Heart of Corruption
F2.DESCRIPTION: At the grove's center, a pulsating cocoon of vines throbs with malign light.
F2.INSPECT: You study the cocoon's rhythm — it beats like a heart.

PRAY.DESCRIPTION: You call on the forest's true spirit to resist the corruption.
PRAY.SUCCESS: A burst of green light pierces the cocoon, the forest gasps in relief.
PRAY.FAIL: The vines tighten around your feet, the corruption answers instead.

F3.TITLE: The Twisted Spirit
F3.DESCRIPTION: From the cocoon bursts a massive, moss-covered spider screeching with hatred.

ANCESTRAL_ECHO.NAME: Ancestral Echo
ANCESTRAL_ECHO.DESCRIPTION: You stumble upon a stone circle half-buried in ash. Whispers rise with the wind, names of the forgotten.

F1.TITLE: Circle of Names
F1.DESCRIPTION: The stones hum softly. Every step you take echoes twice — once in sound, once in memory.

OBSERVE.DESCRIPTION: You study the symbols. They belong to no known language.

PRAY.DESCRIPTION: You repeat one of the whispered names.
PRAY.SUCCESS: A warmth fills your chest — the spirit acknowledges you briefly.
PRAY.FAIL: The air freezes, a shadow stirs behind the stones.

F2.TITLE: Spirit Manifestation
F2.DESCRIPTION: A translucent form coalesces, eyes empty but full of intent.

ASH_BREACH.NAME: Ash Breach
ASH_BREACH.DESCRIPTION: The sky above splits open, bleeding fire and smoke. The air trembles with ancient fury.

F1.TITLE: Field of Cinders
F1.DESCRIPTION: Black ash covers the ground. Each step releases a puff of smoke that smells of burnt iron.

OBSERVE.DESCRIPTION: You kneel, scooping a handful of ash. It glows faintly between your fingers.
OBSERVE.SUCCESS: The ash reacts to your essence, forming glowing sigils before fading.
OBSERVE.FAIL: The ash seeps into your skin, burning with a whisper of pain.

INTERACT.DESCRIPTION: You press your hand to the warm ground — it beats faintly, like a living heart.

F2.TITLE: Crumbling Sanctum
F2.DESCRIPTION: Remnants of an old temple glow faintly red beneath soot. Heat distorts your vision.

INSPECT.DESCRIPTION: You examine the runes, tracing their shapes through the dust.
INSPECT.SUCCESS: You decipher the pattern — a seal restraining something below.
INSPECT.FAIL: The rune flashes and cracks violently, your vision blurs.

PRAY.DESCRIPTION: You attempt a purification prayer to reinforce the seal.
PRAY.SUCCESS: The hum stabilizes, the heat lessens for a brief moment.
PRAY.FAIL: Your words twist into smoke, the seal begins to fracture.

F3.TITLE: The breach opens
F3.DESCRIPTION: A violent tremor splits the ground. Lava erupts from the cracks, cries echo from the depths.

OBSERVE.DESCRIPTION: You sense a presence, you sense something is coming
OBSERVE.SUCCESS: No doubt about it, there's something down there
OBSERVE.FAIL: The lava begins to eat away at your boots, it burns you violently!

PRAY.DESCRIPTION: You try to pray to hold back the thing that seems to want to come out!
PRAY.SUCCESS: Your prayers seem to calm the impending eruption...
PRAY.FAIL: Your words seem to burn as soon as they leave your mouth.

F4.TITLE: Infernal Descent
F4.DESCRIPTION: From the molten breach rises a creature of flame and shadow, scales dripping molten tears.

F5.TITLE: Ashes and Silence
F5.DESCRIPTION: The breach solidifies into stone. The air still vibrates, as if the world were remembering.

REST.DESCRIPTION: Calm has returned; you can finally rest.

OBSERVE.DESCRIPTION: Nothing strange remains on the horizon; the anomaly seems to have evaporated.

RIFT_OF_ECHOES.NAME: Rift of Echoes
RIFT_OF_ECHOES.DESCRIPTION: A trembling fissure hums in the air, like the resonance of an invisible bell.

F1.TITLE: The Broken Silence
F1.DESCRIPTION: The ground vibrates gently. Each step resonates a second later... not in space, but in time.

OBSERVE.DESCRIPTION: You inspect the ground, but it seems perfectly normal.

INSPECT.DESCRIPTION: You try to understand what's happening, but for the moment something eludes you...

F2.TITLE: Voice of the Rift
F2.DESCRIPTION: A whisper rises from within... your own voice, answering questions you never asked.

TALK.DESCRIPTION: You try to answer yourself, but the voice seems to be talking to itself!

PRAY.DESCRIPTION: Let's pray that this voice stops; it can only be a bad sign.
PRAY.SUCCESS: The voice now seems to be answering you... at least that's how you feel.
PRAY.FAIL: The words seem even more confused than before. This conversation makes no sense...

F3.TITLE: Resonating Field
F3.DESCRIPTION: You discover a circular platform of floating stones, vibrating in perfect unison.

INTERACT.DESCRIPTION: You try to control this dance using the levers on the wall.
INTERACT.SUCCESS: You don't know why, but you've played this melody before... someday or in another life.
INTERACT.FAIL: A shard of stone flies from the center of the platform and bleeds into your face.

INSPECT.DESCRIPTION: You wonder what this machine is for... It seems complex and from another time.

F4.TITLE: Manifestation of the Fault
F4.DESCRIPTION: A luminous being forms from fragments of sound, both alive and unfinished.

F5.TITLE: Harmony Restored
F5.DESCRIPTION: The echoes fade. The crack closes with a final, deep sound that resonates in your bones. No more noise from the machine that was running.

OBSERVE.DESCRIPTION: This machine was completely malfunctioning and would soon have opened a portal to the Other World. Thanks to you, this danger has been averted!

ASHEN_CONVERGENCE.NAME: The Ashen Convergence
ASHEN_CONVERGENCE.DESCRIPTION: The horizon folds in on itself, ash floats upward like reversed rain. You feel two worlds overlapping.

F1.TITLE: A Burning Sky
F1.DESCRIPTION: The light is deceptive. The shadows burn brighter than the fire itself and seem to wander as if they have souls.

OBSERVE.DESCRIPTION: You try to understand how these ashes interact and pierce this unreal light.

PRAY.DESCRIPTION: You fall to your knees and try to reconcile this place.
PRAY.SUCCESS: Little by little, the horizon seems to return to its place...
PRAY.FAIL: Now it's the birds that seem to be flying upside down and too close to the ground! One of them strikes you right in the back.

F2.TITLE: The Two Suns
F2.DESCRIPTION: Two luminous orbs float above you, their brilliance twisting and merging in a spiral. To your right, two metal discs, resting on pillars, seem to be able to control these spheres.

INSPECT.DESCRIPTION: Yes, those are indeed two suns you see now; it seems to be some kind of crazy machine.

INTERACT.DESCRIPTION: You try your best to rotate the two discs.
INTERACT.SUCCESS: It looks like the discs are moving away again... or perhaps it's just your mind trying to believe it.
INTERACT.FAIL: You are witnessing the merging of two suns... it's beautiful and terrifying at the same time!

F3.TITLE: Guardian of the Rift
F3.DESCRIPTION: A colossal figure emerges from the spiral, a being of fire and ash with eyes of embers.

F4.TITLE: Convergence Collapse
F4.DESCRIPTION: The suns collide, shattering into shards of burning glass. The world turns white.

OBSERVE.DESCRIPTION: The machine appears to have stopped; only a few small, bright shards remain on the ground.
